author: Mark Guarino
title: Playing against type, Chicago mayor deploys humor in coronavirus fight - Washington Post
description: Playing against type, Chicago mayor deploys humor in coronavirus fight Washington Post Coronavirus exerts heavy toll on blacks in places like Chicago Fox News Chicago mayor defends getting a haircut amid coronavirus | TheHill The Hill Lightfoot says Illinois’…
content: Thats no easy feat given the apocalyptic pronouncements and headlines. While Illinois is no New York in casualties, the state already has recorded more than 13,000 cases of covid-19 the disease caused by the novel coronavirus and 380 deaths. Modeling indicate… [+4916 chars]
